law.catch_line: In all cases, upon representation in writing of any citizen or citizens of any county in which the c...
law.text: In all cases, upon representation in writing of any citizen or citizens of any county in which the county commissioners may determine to build or repair any bridge or unite with an adjoining county to build or repair any bridge between the said adjoining counties filed before a contract for building or repairing has been made that the said determination of the county commissioners is inexpedient, and desiring an appeal from such determination, the county commissioners shall grant such appeal.
